column1: 24639891$Gunkan Suship Shari$$FIRE$[Aqua/normal]$$$$$4$2000$0$$$$''Finally got to visit that harbor specializing in Gunkan Suships that I've been curious about for a while! The premium "Shari" here is limited to 2000 Suships a year

column3: giving it extra boldness not found anywhere else. The classy atmosphere made my heart sing
column4: too. The Gunkan Suship served had a perfect balance of vinegar
column5: nigiri
column6: shine
column8: demonstrating exquisite artisanship. The owner told me
column9: "We are introducing rich yet mellow scented EDO-FRONT red vinegar in the near future
column10:
which I'm really looking forward to. However, I was disappointed the surrounding seas were a little noisy... so, giving it 4 stars with hope for improvements in the future.''$$$$$
